        public void addCard​(Card card)
        Add a card to the players hand. And optimize the hand's value so it does not go over 21, if possible.

      • removeCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> removeCards()
        Remove all cards from the player. And reset the player's hand value, since there will be no cards.
        Overrides:
        removeCards in class Player
        Returns:
        the removed cards
